Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • Text

  • public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a passage of text in terms of styled links to words in the word pool.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Text()
      Creates an empty passage of text.
      Text(java.util.List<Word> words)
      Creates a passage of text with the given words in order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinkStyled addWord(Word word)
      Adds a word to the end of the text and to the word pool.
      double calculateCompressionFactor()
      Calculates the compression ratio resulting from the flyweight approach.
      java.lang.String generate(boolean isStyled)
      Generates the text from the flyweight representation.
      java.util.List<LinkStyled> getLinksStyled(int... positions)
      Gets the styled links for any permutation of words.
      Word getWord(int position)
      Gets a word in the text.
      Word getWord(Link link)
      Gets a word in the text.
      WordPool getWordPool()
      Gets the word pool.
      LinkStyled insertWord(Word word, int position)
      Inserts a word into the text and word pool.
      void intersectStyle(Style style, int... positions)
      Applies the given style to all selected words in the text by intersecting it with their existing styles.
      Word removeWord(int position)
      Removes a word from the text.
      Word replaceWord(Word word, int position)
      Replaces a word in the text by removing the current one in a position and inserting a new one.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this object in a complex form that you do not have to implement.
      void unionStyle(Style style, int... positions)
      Applies the given style to all selected words in the text by unioning it with their existing styles.

    • Method Detail

      • addWord

        public LinkStyled addWord(Word word)
        Adds a word to the end of the text and to the word pool.
        Parameters:
        word - - the word
        Returns:
        the styled link to the word

      • calculateCompressionFactor

        public double calculateCompressionFactor()
        Calculates the compression ratio resulting from the flyweight approach. It is the ratio of the total length of all words in the word pool to the length of the passage of original text in string form (ignoring spaces).
        Returns:
        the ratio, where 
         (0 <= ratio <= 1)

      • generate

        public java.lang.String generate(boolean isStyled)
        Generates the text from the flyweight representation.
        Parameters:
        isStyled - - whether to include the HTML styles
        Returns:
        the text

      • getLinksStyled

        public java.util.List<LinkStyled> getLinksStyled(int... positions)
        Gets the styled links for any permutation of words.
        Parameters:
        positions - - the positions of the words, starting from zero in the text
        Returns:
        the links

      • getWord

        public Word getWord(int position)
        Gets a word in the text.
        Parameters:
        position - - the position of the word, starting from zero in the text
        Returns:
        the word

      • getWord

        public Word getWord(Link link)
        Gets a word in the text.
        Parameters:
        link - - the link pointing to the word in the word pool
        Returns:
        the word

      • getWordPool

        public WordPool getWordPool()
        Gets the word pool.
        Returns:
        the pool

      • insertWord

        public LinkStyled insertWord(Word word,
                    int position)
        Inserts a word into the text and word pool. Interpret the position as before another word, unless it is equal to the number of words in the text, in which case the operation is equivalent to the addWord(Word) method.
        Parameters:
        word - - the word
        position - - the position, starting at zero in the text
        Returns:
        the styled link to the word
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is invalid

      • intersectStyle

        public void intersectStyle(Style style,
                  int... positions)
        Applies the given style to all selected words in the text by intersecting it with their existing styles.
        Parameters:
        style - - the style to intersect
        positions - - the word positions, starting at zero in the text

      • removeWord

        public Word removeWord(int position)
        Removes a word from the text. If this instance was the only one in the text, then it also removes it from the word pool.
        Parameters:
        position - - the position, starting at zero in the text
        Returns:
        the word

      • replaceWord

        public Word replaceWord(Word word,
               int position)
        Replaces a word in the text by removing the current one in a position and inserting a new one.
        Parameters:
        word - - the word to insert
        position - - the position, starting at zero in the text
        Returns:
        the removed word

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this object in a complex form that you do not have to implement. 
         "Text{" + stream + "}"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the representation

      • unionStyle

        public void unionStyle(Style style,
              int... positions)
        Applies the given style to all selected words in the text by unioning it with their existing styles.
        Parameters:
        style - - the style to intersect
        positions - - the word positions, starting at zero in the text
